All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
Main application class for the Hotel Reservation System.
AvailabilityController
Controller for the availability calendar view.
Booking
Represents a booking/reservation in the hotel.
BookingService
Service for managing bookings/reservations.
DatabaseConnection
Utility class for establishing a connection to the database.
Guest
Represents a guest in the hotel.
GuestService
Service for managing guest operations.
LoginController
Controller for the login view.
LoginService
Service class for handling user login and password management.
LoginViewModel
ViewModel for the login view.
LogoutService
 
MainController
Controller for the main view.
MainViewModel
ViewModel for the main view.
ManageGuestsController
Controller for managing guests.
Notification
Represents a notification in the system.
NotificationsController
Controller for managing notifications.
NotificationService
Service class for managing notifications.
ProfileController
Controller for the profile view.
Promo
Represents a promotional offer in the hotel.
PromosController
Controller for managing promotional offers.
PromoService
Service for managing promotional offers.
ReservationsController
Controller for managing reservations.
Room
Represents a room in the hotel.
RoomService
Service for managing rooms.

SettingsService
 
ShiftService
 
Staff
Represents a staff member in the hotel, including their details such as staff ID, name, position, and password.
StaffLog
Represents a log entry of staff activity in the system.

StaffService

Represents a work shift assigned to a staff member.
